SENT.plain: Report of the 10th case of infantile cortical hyperostosis (ICH), diagnosed in utero
Because of a hydramnion noted in the 29th week of gestation, a 38 years old pregnant women was admitted to hospital
Ultrasound, radiographs of the unborn child and amninography were obtained
The radiographic and clinical signs of Caffey's disease are reviewed, and the literature particularly reports on prenatal onset are analyzed
